## Introduction

The data used to perform this *report(?)* was obtained from an open-access Kaggle data repository. Accessing this data can be done through the link below:

https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/iammustafatz/diabetes-prediction-dataset

The objective of this study is to perform a binary classification task with logistic regression, identifying diabetic from non-diabetic observations.
